import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import _ from "lodash/fp"; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; function ProductsAdd({ onAdd, category }) { let history = useHistory(); const [valueInput, setValueInput] = useState({}); const onSubmit = (data) => { onAdd(data); history.push("/admin/products"); } const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm(); return (
